derCategory.name: derNAD
derCategory.overview: Derived constants for LAT volumes not closely associated with one of the main detector subsystems (Not A Detector)

const.name: gridFlange_dz
const.notes: Z-Offset of grid flange pieces within single-tower volume.

const.name: gridWeb_dz
const.notes: Z-Offset of grid web pieces within single-tower volume

const.name: gridFlange_dt
const.notes: Transverse offset of per-tower grid flange pieces

const.name: gridFlange_dtn
const.notes: Negative transverse offset of per-tower grid flange pieces

const.name: gridWeb_dt
const.notes: Transverse offset of per-tower grid web pieces

const.name: gridWeb_dtn
const.notes: Negative transverse offset of per-tower grid web pieces

const.name: LATGridFlange_dt
const.notes: Transverse offset of LAT-wide grid flange pieces

const.name: LATGridFlange_dtn
const.notes: Neg. transverse offset of LAT-wide grid flange pieces

const.name: LATGridWeb_dt
const.notes: Transverse offset of LAT-wide grid web pieces

const.name: LATGridWeb_dtn
const.notes: Neg. transverse offset of LAT-wide grid web pieces

const.name: NADGridWebWidth
const.notes: Full width of grid web in X or Y

const.name: NADGridFlangeWidth
const.notes: Full width of grid flange in X or Y

const.name: NADGridFlangeOuter
const.notes: Width of outer piece of flange (wider than web)

const.name: NADGridFlangeInnerHalf
const.notes: convenience

const.name: NADGridWebInnerHalf
const.notes: convenience

const.name: NADGridLenLong
const.notes: Length of longer outer (not per-tower) grid pieces

const.name: NADGridWebLenShort
const.notes: Length of shorter outer (not per-tower) grid web pieces

const.name: NADGridFlangeLenShort
const.notes: Length of shorter outer (not per-tower) grid flange pieces

const.name: NADGridWebOutsideWidth
const.notes: Width of web outside towers (i.e., 4 * towerPitch)

const.name: NADGridFlangeOutsideWidth
const.notes: Width of flange outside towers (i.e., 4 * towerPitch)

const.name: NADGridWebOutsideLenShort
const.notes: Length of short outside piece of grid web

const.name: NADGridFlange_dz
const.notes: Displacement of flange w.r.t. Ritz origin, which is at its top face

const.name: NADGridWeb_dz
const.notes: Displacement of grid w.r.t. Ritz origin. Web is immediately below flange.

const.name: NADGridFlangeOutsideLenShort
const.notes: Length of short outside piece of grid web

const.name: NADBlanketTopHoleTrans
const.notes: Transverse distance between inner edges of crown May, 2006.

const.name: NADBlanketTopInteriorTrans
const.notes: Transverse dimension of depressed part of top blanket, May, 2006

const.name: NADBlanketTopMidZ
const.notes: Z of middle of three stacked volumes comprising blanket top.

const.name: NADBlanketSideY_l
const.notes: length in long (x) dimension of Y-sides of blanket

const.name: NADBlanketSideX_l
const.notes: length in long (Y) dimension of X-sides of blanket, shorter than Y-sides because Y-sides cover corners

const.name: NADBlanketSide_dt
const.notes: Transverse + displacement of blanket side

const.name: NADBlanketSide_dtn
const.notes: x (resp. y) displacement of neg. x (resp.y) side of blanket

const.name: NADBlanketTopInterior_dz
const.notes: Z-displacement of blanket interior to crown

const.name: NADBlanketTopMid_dz
const.notes: Z-displacement of middle section of blanket, above interior, below outer crown piece

const.name: NADBlanketTopTop_dz
const.notes: Z-displacement of top crown sectio of blanket

const.name: NADBlanketSides_dz
const.notes: z displacement of sides of blanket. Sits just under blanket crown piece.

const.name: NADBlanketSideToSideTileComp
const.notes: Compute distance from inner edge of side blanket to outer edge of side tile (top row)

derCategory.name: derLATelect
derCategory.overview: Derived constants for LAT electronics and associated volumes, such as cabling

const.name: NAD_siu_epu_dxn
const.notes: Some SIUs and EPUs have neg. x displacement

const.name: NADepu_dyn
const.notes: Some EPUs have neg. y displacement

const.name: NADtem_small_dtn
const.notes: TEMs form 4x4 array

const.name: NADtem_large_dtn
const.notes: TEMs form 4x4 array

const.name: NADsiu_dy
const.notes: Same as small TEM transverse displacement

const.name: NADsiu_dyn
const.notes: Same as small TEM transverse displacement

const.name: NADhib_small_dt
const.notes: HIBs have same transverse offsets as TEMs, (but there are only 5 of them so not all combinations occur)

const.name: NADhib_small_dtn
const.notes: HIBs have same transverse offsets as TEMs, (but there are only 5 of them so not all combinations occur)

const.name: NADhib_large_dt
const.notes: HIBs have same transverse offsets as TEMs, (but there are only 5 of them so not all combinations occur)

const.name: NADhib_large_dtn
const.notes: HIBs have same transverse offsets as TEMs, (but there are only 5 of them so not all combinations occur)

const.name: NADelectAlDoubleThick
const.notes: Convenience value

const.name: NADtemIntr_t
const.notes: transverse dimension of TEM interior, excluding Al shell

const.name: NADtemIntr_z
const.notes: z-dimension of TEM interior, excluding Al shell

const.name: NADgasuIntr_x
const.notes: x-dimension of GASU interior, excluding Al shell

const.name: NADgasuIntr_y
const.notes: y-dimension of GASU interior, excluding Al shell

const.name: NADgasuIntr_z
const.notes: z-dimension of GASU interior, excluding Al shell

const.name: NADpduIntr_x
const.notes: x-dimension of PDU interior, excluding Al shell

const.name: NADpduIntr_y
const.notes: y-dimension of PDU interior, excluding Al shell

const.name: NADpduIntr_z
const.notes: z-dimension of PDU interior, excluding Al shell

const.name: LATelectCommonIntr_t
const.notes: transverse dimension of SIU, EPU, HIB interior, excluding Al shell

const.name: LATelectCommonIntr_z
const.notes: Z dimension of SIU, EPU, HIB interior, excluding Al shell

const.name: TEMvol
const.notes: Volume of TEM, including Al shell, in mm**3

const.name: TEMintrVol
const.notes: Volume of TEM, not including Al shell, in mm**3

const.name: TEMAlMass
const.notes: Calc. from TEM dimensions, assuming Al box of one-tenth inch thickness. Result is in grams.

const.name: TEMintrDensity
const.notes: Computed from TEM dimensions and total mass, assuming Al shell of 2.54 mm all around

const.name: GASUvol
const.notes: Volume of GASU, including Al shell, in mm**3

const.name: GASUintrVol
const.notes: Volume of GASU, not including Al shell, in mm**3

const.name: GASUAlMass
const.notes: Calc. from GASU dimensions, assuming Al box of one-tenth inch thickness. Result is in grams.

const.name: GASUintrDensity
const.notes: Computed from GASU dimensions and total mass, assuming Al shell of 2.54 mm all around

const.name: PDUvol
const.notes: Volume of PDU, including Al shell, in mm**3

const.name: PDUintrVol
const.notes: Volume of PDU, not including Al shell, in mm**3

const.name: PDUAlMass
const.notes: Calc. from PDU dimensions, assuming Al box of one-tenth inch thickness. Result is in grams.

const.name: PDUintrDensity
const.notes: Computed from PDU dimensions and total mass, assuming Al shell of 2.54 mm all around

const.name: LATcommonElectCount
const.notes: 5 HIB + 3 EPU + 2 SIU

const.name: LATelectCommonVol
const.notes: Volume of SIU, EPU HIB, including Al shell, in mm**3

const.name: LATelectCommonIntrVol
const.notes: Volume of TEM, not including Al shell, in mm**3

const.name: LATelectCommonAlMass
const.notes: Calc. from SIU/EPU,HIB dimensions, assuming Al box of one-tenth inch thickness. Result is in grams.

const.name: SIUintrDensity
const.notes: Computed from dimensions and total mass, assuming Al shell of 2.54 mm all around

const.name: HIBintrDensity
const.notes: Computed from dimensions and total mass, assuming Al shell of 2.54 mm all around

const.name: LATelectEnv_z
const.notes: Z-dimension of a box just big enough to contain TEMs, GASU, etc.

const.name: LATelectEnv_dz
const.notes: Z-displacement of envelope containing LAT electronics

const.name: XLAT_dz
const.notes: Z displacement of XLAT-plate needs to be a little lower than official value from LAT-TD-00564-12, -477.186, to avoid collision with electronics.

const.name: TEMrel_dz
const.notes: Displacement of TEMs relative to electronics envelope

const.name: L2ElectronicsRel_dz
const.notes: Displacement of GASU, PDU, etc. relative to electronics envelope

const.name: LATelectInnerCable_t
const.notes: Transverse dimension of a box within LAT elect envelope containing approx. half the mass of Cu cables. Assume it goes out to inner boundaries of outer HIBs.

const.name: LATelectInnerCableEnvVol
const.notes: Volume of inner box, densely filled with cable

const.name: LATelectEnvVol
const.notes: Volume entire electronics envelope

const.name: LATelectVol
const.notes: Total volume of TEMs + GASU + PDU + etc.

const.name: LATelectInnerVol
const.notes: Volume of electronics boxes within the inner volume where cabling is most dense. Includes 4 TEMs and the GASU

const.name: LATelectInnerCuDensity
const.notes: 1/2 Cu mass in gm/ (V(inner box) - V(inner elect) in cm**3)

const.name: LATelectOuterCuDensity
const.notes: 1/2 Cu mass in gm / (V(env) - (V(inner cable env) + V(peripheral elect) in cm**3)

const.name: radiator_dyn
const.notes: -Y radiator is symmetrically placed

const.name: radiatorDensity
const.notes: Computed density of a radiator from total mass and dimensions

const.name: XLATdensity
const.notes: Computed density of XLAT from total mass and dimensions

const.name: SCCornerSide
const.notes: Length of corner sides of primary structure octagon. Let q = orthog. projection of side in, say x-direction, so side = sqrt(2)*q. Then 2*q + 2*thick + SCBigSide = SCWidth, or q = 1/2(SCWidth-SCBigSide) - thick.

const.name: tankInnerRadius
const.notes: Inner radius for hydrazine tank (and radius of sphere of hydrazine propellant)

const.name: skirt_dz
const.notes: Z-displacement of skirt

const.name: SCBigSide_dt
const.notes: Transverse displacement of +x or +y side of primary structure

const.name: SCBigSide_dtn
const.notes: Transverse displacement of -x or -y side of primary structure

const.name: SCBigSideClosest
const.notes: Transverse distance between nearest point of big side and origin

const.name: SCCorner_dt
const.notes:
Transverse displacement t of 45-degree sides of primary structure. Can be computed in terms of (half-)length of big side B and 45-degree side b and displacement T of big side:
t**2 = ((B/2)**2 + T**2) - (b/2)**2 is distance. Then each coord. is this quantity / sqrt(2) This is displacement of closest point. Then add 1/2 thickness to get displacement of middle.

const.name: SCCorner_dtn
const.notes: Neg. displacement for corner sides

const.name: SCStruct_dz
const.notes: Z displacement for all 8 primary structure volumes. Roughly, top of skirt = top of primary structure. May refine this later.

const.name: tank_dz
const.notes: vertical displacement for propellant tank and contents. Just assume it's on the bottom: bottom of tank lines up with bottom of primary structure

const.name: SC_HydrazineDensity
const.notes: Compute density in gm/cu cm given that tank of inner radius about 514 mm contains 350 kg of stuff

const.name: opticalBench_x
const.notes: Compute thickness from y and z dimensions, mass and density of aluminum

const.name: opticalBench_dx
const.notes: Compute, assuming optical bench is just to the -X of primary spacecraft structure

const.name: opticalBench_dz
const.notes: Compute, assuming top of optical bench is level with top of primary spacecraft structure

const.name: skirtWidth
const.notes: Length of side of square enclosing skirt

const.name: skirtBigSide_t
const.notes: Length of sides aligned with x or y axis

const.name: skirtCornerSide_t
const.notes: Length of corner sides of skirt

const.name: skirtBigSide_dt
const.notes: Transverse displacement of skirt sides aligned with X or Y

const.name: skirtBigSide_dtn
const.notes: Transverse displacement of skirt sides aligned with X or Y

const.name: skirtCorner_dt
const.notes: Transverse disp. of skirt sides clipping corner of square

const.name: skirtCorner_dtn
const.notes: Neg transverse disp of skirt sides clipping corner of square

const.name: skirtDensity
const.notes: Compute from volume and mass in grams. Result must be gm / cm**3

const.name: solarPanel_dy
const.notes: y-displacement of panel-only part of solar panel w.r.t. envelope including panel and connecting rod

const.name: solarRod_dy
const.notes: y-displacement of rod part of solar panel w.r.t. envelope including panel and connecting rod

const.name: solarPanelEnv_dy
const.notes: y-displacement of entire (+Y) solar panel envelope w.r.t. Ritz origin.

const.name: solarPanelEnv_dyn
const.notes: y-displacement of entire (-Y) solar panel envelope w.r.t. Ritz origin.

const.name: solarPanelEnv_dz
const.notes: z-displacement of entire solar panel envelope w.r.t. Ritz origin.

const.name: solarPanelSi_dz
const.notes: z-displacement of Si part of solar panel w.r.t. envelope including panel and connecting rod

const.name: solarPanelCore_dz
const.notes: z-displacement of core part of solar panel w.r.t. envelope including panel and connecting rod

const.name: NADSolarRodDiam
const.notes: Diameter of rods connecting solar panels to spacecraft
